Wuketits | image = Franz Wuketits.jpg | imagesize = 295px | caption = Franz Wuketits (2007) | birth_date = 5 January 1955 | birth_place = Parndorf, Burgenland, Austria | death_date = 6 June 2018 (aged 63) | death_place = Vienna, Austria | occupation = Biologist | language = German | nationality = Austrian | spouse = }} Franz Manfred Wuketits (5 January 1955 – 6 June 2018) was an Austrian biologist, university teacher and epistemologist. He has written on epistemology, the history and theory of biology, evolution theory, evolutionary ethics, evolutionary epistemology and sociobiology. From 1987 till 2004 he was employed at the University of Graz where he taught the philosophy of biology. He also had guest professorships at several other universities including the Vienna University of Technology (1998–2004) and, in Palma de Majorca, at the University of the Balearic Islands (2006, 2008, 2009, 2010). ==References== ==Other websites== * Franz M.
